control.description-key: Allows users to select a parent entity type and record, then auto-populates fields via field mapping

property.name: regardingRecordType
property.description-key: Lookup to Record Type entity for the selected parent entity type

property.name: regardingRecordId
property.description-key: GUID of the selected regarding record

property.name: regardingRecordName
property.description-key: Display name of the selected regarding record

property.name: apiBaseUrl
property.description-key: Base URL for BFF API field mapping endpoints
